prodNameC: "必帝" A毒素快速色層分析試劑
prodNameE: "BD" Color PAC Toxin A Test Kit
ingredientsDesc:
Reagent 1 Sample Buffer: Buffered saline with a mucolytic agent, 1% detergent.
Reagent 2 Detector A: Rabbit C. difficile toxin A antibody-coated liposomes.
Reagent 3 Detector B: Rabbit antibody-coated liposomes specific for Detector A.
Reagent W Wash Reagent: Buffered saline solution with bovine protein stabilizer, 0.1% detergent.
Control + Positive Control: Buffered saline solution with bovine protein stabilizer, inactivated C. difficile toxin A.
Control – Negative Control: Buffered saline solution with bovine protein stabilizer.
        Reagents and controls each contain 0.2% sodium azide (preservative).
30 Test Devices Each containing a test strip coated with monoclonal C. difficile toxin A antibody and C. difficile toxin A.
applicantName: 美商必帝股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區忠孝東路四段560號8樓
efficacy: 定量偵測出病人糞便中C.difficile，亦可檢測培養基及BHI培養液是否具有C.difficile。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.2660 微生物鑑別及測定器材
